sentences.en: A writer's weaknesses are what endear him to a hsingling critic.

sentences.en: Good work Milan, you know how to endear yourself to the fans rightaway.

sentences.en: He managed to endear himself to everybody.
sentences.cn: 他有办法让大家都喜欢他.

sentences.en: He managed to endear himself to my entire family.
sentences.cn: 他能让我全家人都喜欢他.

sentences.en: Her object was to endear herself to her friend.
sentences.cn: 她的目标是,使她的朋友喜爱她.

sentences.en: His human compassion and respect for others endear him to many.
sentences.cn: 他对人性的同情和尊重,使许多人喜欢他.

sentences.en: One of the easiest ways to endear yourself to someone is to make them laugh.
sentences.cn: 让别人喜欢自己,最简单的办法就是让他们发笑.

sentences.en: The day was magnificent. The whole world was blue endear haze.
sentences.cn: 天气好极了. 整个世界笼罩在一片传奇般的蓝色雾霭之中.

sentences.en: Their taste for gambling has endeared them to Las Vegas casino owners.
sentences.cn: 他们对赌博的爱好使其受到了拉斯韦加斯赌场老板们的欢迎。

words.tran_cn: 可爱的；讨人喜欢的；引起爱情的

trans.tran_en: If something endears you to someone or if you endear yourself to them, you become popular with them and well liked by them

trans.tran_cn: 使受喜爱，使亲密，使被爱恋
